001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.server.tcp;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.server.DnsServerConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.server.DnsServerService;
006import jakarta.inject.Inject;
007import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
008import org.eclipse.jetty.server.Server;
009import org.eclipse.jetty.server.ServerConnector;
010import org.glassfish.hk2.runlevel.RunLevel;
011import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
012
013@Service(name = "dns.server.tcp")
014@RunLevel(4)
015public class DNSTCPConnectorService {
016
017    @Inject
018    public DNSTCPConnectorService(Configuration configuration, Server server, DnsServerService dnsServerService, LoggerContext loggerContext) {
019        DnsServerConfiguration config = new DnsServerConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.server"));
020
021        ServerConnector connector = new ServerConnector(server, new DNSTCPConnectionFactory(dnsServerService, loggerContext));
022        connector.setIdleTimeout(config.getDNSTCPConfiguration().getIdleTimeout().toMillis());
023        connector.setPort(config.getPort());
024        connector.setName("DNS");
025
026        server.addConnector(connector);
027    }
028}
